Emperors that is to say, a slow movement of the hand on the dial of hu- man history. 
Prince Andrew was on duty that day and in constant attendance on the commander in chief. 
At six in the evening, Kutiizov went to the Emperor's headquarters and after staying but a short time with the Tsar went to see the grand marshal of the court, Count Tolst6y.
